cbinstall.name: CMC CB Plugin
cbinstall.author: Compojoom - Yves Hoppe
cbinstall.description: A Community Builder plugin for CMC.

params.description: Plugin which integrates CMC - Mailchimp for Joomla! into Community Builder

param.name: intro-text
param.label: Intro-Text:
param.description: This text will be displayed above your signup form.

param.name: outro-text-1
param.label: Text above submit
param.description: This text will be displayed above the submit button.

param.name: outro-text-2
param.label: Text below submit
param.description: This text will be displayed below the submit button.

param.name: thankyou
param.default: Thank you! Please check your email and confirm the newsletter subscription.
param.label: ThankYou Message
param.description: This message will be displayed after a successfull signup. (You can also use a placeholder and add it to the language files.)

param.name: updateMsg
param.default: You were already subscribed to this list. Your settings have been updated. Thank you!
param.label: Update Message
param.description: This message will be displayed if the user has already been signed up to the list. In that case the selected fields/groups will be updated. (You can also use a placeholder and add it to the language files.)

param.name: listid
param.label: List
param.description: Select the subscriber list to which people will sign up to.

param.name: fields
param.label: Fields
param.description: These list fields (merge tags) will be displayed on the signup form. FNAME, LNAME and EMAIL are already supplied by CB!

param.name: interests
param.label: Interests
param.description: These interest groups will be displayed on the signup form.

param.name: dateFormat
param.label: Date format
param.description: If you are using a date field you can define the format here.

param.name: phoneFormat
param.label: Phone Format
param.description: If you are using a phone field select whether to display it in US or international format. US = (###) ### - #### ; International = ##########

param.name: address2
param.label: Show address 2
param.description: If you are using address fields, do you want to display the address line 2 field?

tab.name: Mailing Lists
tab.description: Enables the user to manage his subscription to the Cmc Lists
